title: Now THIS is what you want in the post-game chat screen!
body:
*(Sup guise long time no see)*

So today I played a game as Blitz and we were a definite loss. All feeding and being melted by the enemy alkali, fizz and fiddlesticks.

But then, we CAME BACK! It was epic and well yeah we won. I'd like to share the post-game chat screen with you in the community, urging you to **NEVER EVER SURRENDER.**

Can I say the majority of my games have been 4/1 surrender votes. (I'm against surrendering, but thats a discussion for another day)

Match history: [http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/74722288/200515171?tab=overview ](http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/74722288/200515171?tab=overview)

replies.body: pft, u should of surrendered, no point trying

And?

It was a normal, call me crazy but must win is hardly the top priority.
I wanted to create a negative energy, wasn't actually serious {{champion:119}}
I'm being serious, if the game is just unfun, surrender is fine to be done (unless in ranked).
You my friend is who should be being banned, not AFKers or Trolls. SURRENDERING is what makes the game unfun. {{champion:63}}
Yes cause people delibritely delaying a finished game for another 20 minutes cause they are winning is totally fun.
I'm surprised there Isn't more, OMFG NOOB REPORT UNISTALL KID
